scripts.demo:run: pnpm run all:lib && pnpm run demo --filter miolo-demo
scripts.all:clean: pnpm run miolo:clean && pnpm run tools:clean && pnpm run hooks:clean && pnpm run demo:clean
scripts.all:lint: pnpm run miolo:lint && pnpm run tools:lint && pnpm run hooks:lint  && pnpm run demo:lint
scripts.all:lib: pnpm run miolo:lib && pnpm run tools:lib && pnpm run hooks:lib
scripts.all:dist: pnpm run tools:dist && pnpm run hooks:dist
scripts.all:prepare: pnpm run miolo:prepare && pnpm run tools:prepare && pnpm run hooks:prepare
scripts.all:publish: pnpm publish --filter miolo && pnpm publish --filter miolo-tools && pnpm publish --filter miolo-hooks && pnpm publish --filter miolo-demo
scripts.purge: pnpm run all:clean && rm -fr pnpm-lock.yaml node_modules packages/miolo/node_modules packages/miolo-tools/node_modules packages/miolo-demo/node_modules
